Description:
------------
A sports game of outrageous, crazy world of sports brings some of the darkest sports in the world for the video game world for the first time. The game takes players on a journey around the world to participate in some of the lesser known sports such as Italy, the Netherlands and Australia. The ten sports in the game all starts easy enough, but the more advanced a player becomes the most extreme sports to be! Launch of tuna has been a popular sport under a number of years, but how far can a tuna be released in the comfort of your living room? Drop an old couch to take part in the careers of furniture, but the grandmother is not still sitting in it, because the chairs are fast! And if that still is not strange enough, what about ironing a shirt while skydiving in the case of extreme ironing?
